hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: backup_current_data
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Creates a backup of the previous genomic data before replacing it with the staged data. This will delete any previously backed up data

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: clean
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Whether to delete existing genomic data first. If false, will incrementally add staged data to existing data

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if $backup_current_data ; then rm -f /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/all-bak mv /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/all /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/all-bak fi if $clean ; then rm -rf /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/all/* fi mv /usr/local/docker-config/vcf-load/genomic/* /usr/local/docker-config/hpds/all/
